data.title: Live Portrait AI|LivePortrait-Photo Animate By Hugging Face
data.description: Live Portrait AI(LivePortrait) use AI to animate still photos with Hugging Face, creating lifelike videos ideal for personalized video communication
data.content:

===============

[![Image 1: Live Portrait AI - Bring Photos to Life with AI Animation | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/product_review.svg?product_id=592625&theme=light)](https://www.producthunt.com/products/live-portrait-ai/reviews?utm_source=badge-product_review&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-live-portrait-ai)

âœ¨ Introducing Live Portrait AI

Animate Your Photos with Live Portrait AI
=========================================

With Live Portrait AI, transform static images into animated videos with realistic facial expressions and movements. Start now for free.

[Get Started for free](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

What Our Users Say About Live Portrait AI
-----------------------------------------

Discover how Live Portrait AI is transforming photo animation for users worldwide. Read their stories and see why they love our AI-powered image-to-video tool.

Discover the Power of Live Portrait AI's AI-Driven Animation
------------------------------------------------------------

Photo Animation

Photo Animation
---------------

Live Portrait AI uses reenactment technology to animate a person in a still photo, matching the head movement, facial expressions, emotions, and even voice of a driver video. This breathes new life into static images.

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

Animate Animals

Animate Animals
---------------

Bring your favorite animal photos to life with our advanced AI animation technology. Watch as still images of pets, wildlife, and more transform into charming, realistic animated videos.

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

Portrait animation from a still image with stitching

Portrait animation from a still image with stitching
----------------------------------------------------

Across various styles (realistic, oil painting, sculpture, 3d rendering) and different sizes

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

Portrait video editing with stitching

Portrait video editing with stitching
-------------------------------------

Easily create personalized video messages, greetings, and announcements by animating photos with Live Portrait AI. Ideal for personalized video communication.

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

FacePoke

FacePoke
--------

FacePoke is a tool that allows you to poke fun at your friends by animating their photos.

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/facepoke)

Excellent Experience

Excellent Experience
--------------------

Comparisons with existing methods, our model can generate more realistic and diverse animations

[Try This Magic](https://liveportrait.org/playground)

Creator Testimonials About Live Portrait AI
-------------------------------------------

Learn how content creators and industry professionals are leveraging Live Portrait AI to produce engaging videos across different sectors.

[![Image 46: A.I.Warper](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1717327625331597312/4b1S4CTx_normal.jpg)](https://twitter.com/AIWarper/status/1821630541361537238)

How to do this: 1) generate a still image of the girl 2) film yourself pretending to be real time with tame movements 3) Pipe through live portrait 4) upscale output with topaz 5) composite your source video from step 2 down on the corner Profit

How To Use Live Portrait AI
---------------------------

Creating animated videos with Live Portrait AI is easy. Follow these steps to transform your photos into lifelike animations.

![Image 59](https://cdn.rareblocks.xyz/collection/celebration/images/steps/2/curved-dotted-line.svg)

1

### Upload Source Image

Live Portrait AI extracts the face from your image and prepares it for animation. Ensure the picture has a clear face.

2

### Upload Driving Video

Combine your video with the source image. Live Portrait AI will sync the face movements to the video, creating a seamless video.

3

### Click Generate

Generate your animated video by clicking the button. Watch as Live Portrait AI brings your photo to life.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### What is Live Portrait AI?

Live Portrait AI is an AI-powered technology that brings still photos to life by animating them, matching the head movement, facial expressions, emotions, and even voice of a driver video.

### What are the key features of Live Portrait AI?

Key features include Photo Animation, Multiple Face Animation, Personalized Video Communication, Training Content Creation, Content Localization, and Cost-Effective Video Production.

### How does Live Portrait AI support content localization?

Live Portrait AI enables seamless scaling and localization of marketing and educational content across regions, languages, and dialects, making content accessible globally.

### Is Live Portrait AI available on mobile devices?

Yes, Live Portrait AI technology is available through various platforms including mobile applications on platforms like Google Play Store.

### How can Live Portrait AI be used for training content creation?

Live Portrait AI easily converts existing training materials like documents or audio files into engaging video content, making learning more interactive and effective.

### Are there any DIY solutions for creating animated portraits?

Yes, there are open-source solutions available, such as workflows in ComfyUI, that allow users to generate and animate custom avatars using personal photos.

### What are the privacy measures in place?

Live Portrait AI ensures your data is secure with end-to-end encryption and strict privacy policies.

### How accurate is the animation?

Live Portrait AI uses advanced AI algorithms to ensure highly accurate and realistic animations, closely matching the movements and expressions of the source material.

### Can Live Portrait AI animate more than one face in an image?

Yes, Live Portrait AI can animate multiple faces within the same image and stitch them back into the original photo seamlessly.

### What are the main benefits of using Live Portrait AI for content creators?

Content creators can generate highly engaging and personalized video content quickly and cost-effectively, adding a new level of interaction and realism to their projects.

### Is there a limit to the length of the audio file?

Currently, Live Portrait AI supports audio files up to 10 minutes in length. For longer files, please contact support.

### Can I adjust the facial expressions manually?

Live Portrait AI automatically adjusts facial expressions to match the audio, but manual adjustments are not supported at this time.

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact us at [support@liveportrait.org](mailto:support@liveportrait.org)
